are you using the proprietary nVidia drivers?
the open source "nouveau" driver will do 2D. perhaps in more efficient ways? but if you need 3D, you need to proprietary driver.
disable all 3D acceleration, and switch drivers. see what happens.
how to switch back to old drivers?
the same way you added the proprietary. disable those in the Restricted Drivers panel.
if you remove them and reboot, the kernel should default back to what it has compiled in. in this case nouveau.
